alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:46PM CDT until July 13 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CLAY...NORTH CENTRAL WILKIN AND EAST CENTRAL CASS COUNTIES... At 446 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Moorhead, or over Fargo, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fargo, Moorhead, West Fargo, Dilworth, Glyndon, Sabin and Reile`s Acres. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 56 and 70. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 346 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 16. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
